channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Simplify development with Dev Container templates for Azure SQL Database – Preview】使用 Azure SQL 数据库的开发容器模板简化开发 - 预览
item.description: 【In today’s fast-paced software development landscape, having a reliable and efficient local development setup is crucial. Dev Containers provide developers with a seamless way to build and test applications locally before deploying them to the cloud. We are announcing the Public Preview of Dev Container templates for Azure SQL Database.】在当今快节奏的软件开发环境中，拥有可靠且高效的本地开发设置至关重要。开发容器为开发人员提供了一种在将应用程序部署到云之前在本地构建和测试应用程序的无缝方法。我们宣布推出 Azure SQL 数据库开发容器模板的公共预览版。

item.title: 【New Boards Hub Rollout Update】新板中心推出更新
item.description: 【Back in March, we shared an update on our initiative to make the New Boards Hub the default experience for all organizations. However, that rollout was delayed as we shifted priorities for several months. Today, we’re excited to announce that the rollout of the New Boards Hub is back on track.】早在三月份，我们就分享了有关让新董事会中心成为所有组织的默认体验的计划的最新信息。然而，由于我们将优先事项转移了几个月，该推出被推迟了。今天，我们很高兴地宣布新董事会中心的推出已重回正轨。

item.title: 【New debugging and diagnostic features】新的调试和诊断功能
item.description: 【Debugging and diagnostics are vital skills for any developer, but they can also be difficult and time-consuming to get proficient . That’s why we’ve added some fantastic new features and enhancements to Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 that will help you find and resolve bugs faster and easier than ever before.】调试和诊断对于任何开发人员来说都是至关重要的技能，但要精通它们也可能很困难且耗时。因此，我们在 Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 中添加了一些出色的新功能和增强功能，以帮助您比以往更快、更轻松地查找和解决错误。

item.title: 【New Azure DevOps Server Roadmap】新的 Azure DevOps 服务器路线图
item.description: 【While we recommend our hosted service for most customers due to its scalability and flexibility, we understand the importance of the on-premises version for many of our customers. Therefore, we remain committed to providing support and improvement for both versions. Previously,】虽然我们因其可扩展性和灵活性而向大多数客户推荐我们的托管服务，但我们了解本地版本对于许多客户的重要性。因此，我们仍然致力于为这两个版本提供支持和改进。之前，

item.title: 【Constructing nodes of a hand-made linked list, how hard can it be?】构建一个手工链表的节点，有多难？
item.description: 【Trying to force copy elision.】试图强制复制省略。

item.title: 【Public preview of SharePoint Framework 1.20 – First release of upcoming features】SharePoint 框架 1.20 的公共预览版 – 即将推出的功能的第一个版本
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the first preview of the upcoming SharePoint Framework 1.20. This time focus is primarily on the Microsoft Viva platform capabilities.】我们很高兴地宣布即将推出的 SharePoint Framework 1.20 的第一个预览版。这次的重点主要是 Microsoft Viva 平台功能。

item.title: 【Another tribute to Microsoft history hiding in Building 41】隐藏在 41 号楼​​的另一项对微软历史的致敬
【Customer Case Study: KPMG Clara AI and Microsoft’s Semantic Kernel】客户案例研究：KPMG Clara AI 和 Microsoft 的语义内核
item.description: 【Today we’re featuring KPMG on our Semantic Kernel blog for their work on Clara AI in KPMG. You can learn more about the solution here: KPMG Partnership with Microsoft’s Semantic Kernel Here’s a quote from KPMG on the partnership, “Microsoft and KPMG entered a strategic alliance to modernize the work of KPMG professionals.】今天，我们在语义内核博客上重点介绍毕马威 (KPMG) 在毕马威 (KPMG) 在 Clara AI 方面的工作。您可以在此处了解有关该解决方案的更多信息：毕马威与微软语义内核的合作关系以下是毕马威关于合作伙伴关系的引述：“微软和毕马威建立了战略联盟，以实现毕马威专业人员的工作现代化。

item.title: 【Go 1.23.0-1 Microsoft build now available】Go 1.23.0-1 Microsoft 版本现已推出
item.description: 【A new set of Microsoft Go builds is now available for download.】一组新的 Microsoft Go 版本现已可供下载。

item.title: 【New git tooling features】新的 git 工具功能
item.description: 【Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 includes fantastic updates to everyone working with Git. They bring the richness of both GitHub and Azure DevOps into Visual Studio and part of your natural workflow. This greatly simplifies your inner loop, making you even more productive than before.】Visual Studio 2022 v17.11 为所有使用 Git 的人提供了精彩的更新。它们将 GitHub 和 Azure DevOps 的丰富性带入 Visual Studio 中，并成为您自然工作流程的一部分。这极大地简化了您的内部循环，使您比以前更加高效。
